ovdesc.p: OC.CLEARING.MEMBER is a parameter level table that contains information about the clearing member/Broker.

desc.p: Should be a valid OC.CUSTOMER ID
Customer should have a customer type defined as clearing member in OC.CUSTOMER table.
This field explains the means of interface between T24 bank and its Clearing Member.
Valid Values are Auto and Manual.
Denotes how the trade and position data is exchanged with the clearing member.
Valid Values are Secure File transfer , MQ , SWIFT file act,other and null .

Indicates whether the trade cleared is based on Principal or Agent model. If the Model is Principal, the Counterparty to a cleared trade would be the Clearing Member and if the model is Agent, then the Counterparty would be Central Clearing Party/House.
Valid values are Principal and Agency.
This is a multi value field.
Denotes the clearing house that a clearing member belongs to.
Should be a valid clearing house ID defined in clearing house table.
